pr_title: FM2-280: Add support for localisation of narratives

timeline.bodyText: Returning null so that absence of the message can be identified in the templates.
timeline.author: ShivanshRakesh

replies.bodyText: @ShivanshRakesh Things like this should be added as a comment to the code. It's a good point though.
replies.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Used a setter so that ReloadableResourceBundleMessageSource could be set as messageSource in web tests.
timeline.author: ShivanshRakesh

timeline.bodyText: Using a default value if the message is absent, so that populating the messages.properties won't be required for English language (and the default would be English too).
timeline.author: ShivanshRakesh

replies.bodyText: I'd make sure that these defaults also exist at least in the base message.properties file.
replies.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Setting a ReloadableResourceBundleMessageSource as messageSource for web tests.
timeline.author: ShivanshRakesh
ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Please use the existing messages.properties files in the API rather than adding them to the OMOD.
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: @ibacher I tried using the one in API, but it doesn't seem to work. I mean the MessageResolver is not fetching messages from those files.
replies.author: ShivanshRakesh

replies.bodyText: That's problematic. Does it work if you run this code in an actual instance of OpenMRS?
replies.author: ibacher
ShivanshRakesh

replies.bodyText: @ibacher Also, aren't the messages.properties files supposed to be in the /omod/src/main/resources directory as mentioned in the wiki? Or is it configured differently in FHIR?
replies.author: ShivanshRakesh

timeline.bodyText: Move these two lines down just before the call to setMessageSource()
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we expect that the output is the same?
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: Yeah, actually it's the : which is missing after the property names.
replies.author: ShivanshRakesh

timeline.bodyText: Changed Organisation to Organization since the property name had z instead of s; hence the change in expected narrative.
timeline.author: ShivanshRakesh
